abstract.para: This file provides documentation for file 96boct04.dat, a comma delimited file that contains Rhodamine WT (RWT) concentrations over time at two sites on the Lower Kuparuk River July 12-17, 1996.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications
A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Solute injection was made approximately 20 meters upstream of the 15N addition. Samples were taken at 1800 meters and 10400 meters downstream.

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATA RECEIVED: June 1997 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Karie Slavik DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: DATA:

para.literalLayout: Estimates of travel time were made to guide the collection of physical samples. Samples were collected in 13 mm diameter borsilicate glass vials at irregular time intervals weighted to cover the rising and falling limbs more intensively than other time periods. Sample concentrations were read on a Turner Designs AU-10 field fluorometer. The table below contains the solute injection parameters. Injection Start: 17:00, July 12 Injection End: 08:30, July 15 Stock Concentration: 1130000 mg/L Injection Rate: 12.017 mL/min

Notes: The variable, D/D for River distance is in reference to the distances established for the 15N addition. (11) VARIABLE DESCRIPTIONS: Precis. Coded? Missing Variable Variable Description Units (Y/N) Values Site site of measurement y n D/D River distance 5m n n Location Sampling location n n Time Time hhmm n n Date date dd-mmm-yy n n RWT RWT concentration ug/L n n Comments Comments

Reference Citations: Kilpatrick,F.A. and Cobb,E.D. 1985. Measurement of discharge using tracers. Techniques of Water-Resource Investigations of the United States Geological Survey. Stream Solute Workshop 1990. Concepts and methods for assessing solute dynamics in stream ecosystems. J. N. Amer. Benthol. Soc., 9(2):95-119.
